explains: n. 一百周年；一百周年纪念

sentences.en: The centennial Olympics was in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 奥运会百年庆典在乔治亚州的亚特兰大举行。

sentences.en: The forearm and torch of the Statue of Liberty were on display at the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia, 1876.
sentences.cn: 1876年，自由女神像的前臂和火炬在费城百年博览会上展出。

sentences.en: There are many centennial houses on the street.
sentences.cn: 街上有好多栋百年老屋。
